item.title: Amputees often feel disconnected from their bionic hands. AI could bridge the gap
item.description: Sensors and artificial intelligence help a prosthetic hand act more like a natural one, new research shows.

item.title: I hate getting Pap smears. Is there a safe alternative?
item.description: You may have heard about HPV testing and self-swabbing to collect the sample. Does that work as well? Here are the ins and outs of this newer option.

item.title: Botulism outbreak sickens more than 50 babies and expands to all ByHeart products
